title: The industrial zone on which Residential / Commercial permission is granted, it shall be deemed to be converted into Residential / Commercial zone to the extent of that area, after issuance of final occupation certificate to the project
clause_text: The industrial zone on which Residential / Commercial permission is granted, it shall be deemed to be converted into Residential / Commercial zone to the extent of that area, after issuance of final occupation certificate to the project.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
